Moses Daddy-Ajala Simon (a mụrụ na abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Julaị n'ime otu puku afọ na narị iteghete na iri iteghete na ịse (1995) bu onye Naijiria bụ okacha mara n'egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agba ihu na otu egwuregwu Nantes Ligue 1 na otu egwuregwu mba Nigeria
A mụrụ na Jos, nna ya jere ozi na ndị agha Naịjirịa tupu ọ laa ezumike nka
Simon bụ ngwaahịa sitere na GBS Academy a ma ama, otu ụlọ akwụkwọ egwuregwu bọọlụ ahụ na Nigeria nke zụpụtara ndị dika Ahmed Musa
E jikọtara ya na ụlọ ọgbakọ Premier League nke Nigeria Kaduna United, n'ihi na ọtụtụ klọb ndị ọkachamara n'ụwa niile chọkwara ịbịnye aka na ya

Na abalị iri nke ọnwa May ọfọ puku abụọ na ịrị na atọ (2013), a mara ọkwa na Simon abanyela na nkwekọrịta  ya na otu egwuregwu Dutch AFC Ajax isonyere ha na ọzụzụ oge tupu oge, ebe e jikọtaburu ya na Liverpool FC na Tottenham Hotspur

Ọ pụtara ìhè nke mbụ ya maka Ajax na abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Julị na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na atọ (2013) na asọmpi nkwado nke enyi megide De Graafschap, na-abata dị ka onye eji gbanwe onye ọzọ ma sụnye ọkpụ goolu nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ, na mmeri goolu atọ asatara nanị otu

Ọ pụtarakwara ọzọ na abalị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Julaị, gbaara ndị ọnọ na oche Jong Ajax na egwuregwu enyi na enyi nkwado oge megide Voorschoten '97, ebe ọ sụnyere goolu nke abụọ na mmeri ụlọ ha nwetara site na ọkpụ goolu ise asaghị asa
Na ịrị abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Julaị, afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na atọ, a mara ọkwa na otu egwuregwu Ajax agaghị ebinye aka na akwụkwọ ịkọrọ nwa okorobịa Naijiria a, ma hapụ ya site na nchịkọta oge tupu oge
Mgbe mkparita ụka nke nkwupụta a bidorochara ha na AS Trenčín; otu egwuregwu ha na Ajax na emekọri na Slovakia nke onye nwe ya bụ onye gbagburu Ajax bọọlụ Tschen La Ling
Na abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na anọ (13 Jenụwarị 2014), Simon bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ na otu egwuregwu AS Trenčín
nKe Slovak.Ọ ga-eso onye ogbo ya Kingsley Madu
O mere egwuregwu mpụta mbụ ya na asọmpi ha gbara otu ọkpụ otu ọkpụ megide MFK Košice malite na nku aka nri ya na Gino van Kessel onye nọ lonu sitere na otu egwuregwu Ajax

O mere mpụta mbụ nke mba ụwa na klọb ya n'oge mkpọsa Trenčín's 2014–15 UEFA Europa League, mgbe ewebatara ya n'oge asọmpi mbido nke abụọ, na egwuregwu ụlọ megide Vojvodina Novi Sad si Serbia (nke e gwuritara na ama egwuregwu dị na Dubnica, Slovakia) Simon sụnyere  okpu goolu atọ na mpụta mbụ ya na mmeri ha ji ọkpụ anọ asaghị asa wee merie  n'ụlọ
Dika Trenčín ga-emecha kpochapụ na agba na-esote, n'ihi enwetaghi mmeri n'ụlọ, nakwa mmeri ndị otu Hull City
jiri ọkpụ goolu abụọ asatara otu merie ha n'ụlọ nke ha.

Na ọnwa Octooba afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na anọ (October 2014) egwuregwu ESPN  kwadoro akụkọ nnyocha maka Moses Simon nke jikọtara ọgba ákụkụ ahụ na ịkwaga otu egwuregwu Liverpool, Tottenham Hotspur, Hull City tinyere nnukwu ihe nnweta nyere otu egwuregwu Ajax
Ọnọdụ ahụ ghọrọ nnukwu agha  n'etiti Dutch club SC Heerenveen na KAA Gent, nke otu egwuregwu nke abụọ ahụ mesịrị nwee nkwekọrịta  ka ọgba ákụkụ ahụ sonyeere otu egwuregwu ha afọ atọ.
Na abalị isii nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na ịse (6 Jenụwarị 2015), a mara ọkwa na KAA Gent abịanyela aka na akwụkwọ maka Moses Simon na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ

Ọ mere mpụta mbụ ya maka Gent na abalị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na ise (17 Jenụwarị 2015) na mmeri ọkpụ atọ asatara otu (3–1) megide Royal Mouscron-Péruwelz na egwuregwu liigi
Mpụtara ya nke abụọ mere ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị na mmeri ụlọ ha ji otu ọkpụ asaghị asa meria Sporting Lokeren na  Iko ndị Belgian , bụ nke a chụpụrụ Simon  na tinkọm tinkọm ole e jiri webata ya.
N'egwuregwu liigi nke atọ ya megide Sporting Lokeren, Simon sụnyere ọkpụ goolu atọ, nke mere e jiri kpọọ ya onye ọkpụkpọ egwuregwu Belgium nke izu ahụ
Ọ ghọrọ onye ọkpụkpọ isi ngwa ngwa na nhazi onye nchịkwa Hein Vanhaezebrouck wee nyere Gent aka imeri aha asọmpi mba mbụ ha na Mee afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na ise
Ọnwa abụọ ka e mesịrị, Simon nyere Laurent Depoitre aka na ọkpụ mmeri ọ sụnyere na Nnukwu Iko Belgian nke afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na ise  megide ndị mmeri iko Club Brugge
Na abalị isii nke ọnwa Ọgọst afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asatọ ( 6 August 2018), Simon sonyeere Levante otu egwuregwu si Spanish La Liga na nkwekọrịta afọ ise
N'ọnwa Maachị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na iteghete (2019) o kwuru na obi dị ya ụtọ na ọ na-agbara otu egwuregwu ahụ
Na abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Ọgọst afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na iteghete (15 Ọgọst 2019), enyefere Simon n'aka otu egwuregwu Ligue 1 FC Nantes
Na njedebe nke oge, Nantes kpalitere nhọrọ ịzụta Simon
Ọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta afọ anọ na otu egwuregwu ahụ

Simon nwetara ọkpụkpọ oku mbụ ya na ndị otu egwuregwu mba Nigeria site n'aka onye nchịkwa Daniel Amokachi na ọnwa Maashị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na ịse (March 2015) wee mee mpụta mbụ ya na abalị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa ahụ na egwuregwu enyị na enyi nke ụwa megide Uganda, mgbe ọ nọchiri Anthony Ujah mgbe nkeji iri ise na iteghete gasịrị na egwuregwu ahụ

Simon nyere goolu mbụ ya maka Naijiria na egwuregwu enyi na enyi mba ụwa megide Niger na abalị asatọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na ịse (8 September 2015), nke abụọ na mmeri ọkpụ goolu abụọ asaghị asa (2–0)
Naijiria họpụtara ya maka ndị otu ha dị mmadụ iri atọ na ise maka asọmpi Olimpiks Summer nke afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na isii (2016)
N'ọnwa Mee afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asatọ (2018), a kpọrọ aha ya na ndị otu egwuregwu iri atọ mbụ Naịjirịa maka asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa nke afọ 2018 na Russia
Agbanyeghị, o soghị na mmadụ iri abụo na atọ ikpeazụ n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
Agụnyere ya na otu nwoke iri abụọ na atọ nke mba ahụ maka asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2019
Àtụ:Updated
Dika asọmpi e mere na abalị iri atọ nke ọnwa Julaị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị abụọ

Mpụtara na UEFA Champions league
